name: Drop-in: Croquet
description: Come play the game of kings and queens: croquet! Similar to golf, but played with mallets and larger balls, this game is fun for all ages!
fullDescription: Come play the game of kings and queens: croquet! Similar to golf, but played with mallets and larger balls, this game is fun for all ages!
whatTheyOffer: Come play the game of kings and queens: croquet! Similar to golf, but played with mallets and larger balls, this game is fun for all ages!
howToGetIt: If this is a Drop-In program, please go to the meeting location at the activity start time.
